column5: Boy has the world changed eh. Back in the day,if you wore pink,you were called,,,,,,,,,,,,,.  NFL, good on ya for the support.  http://www.seattlepi.com/news/article/NFL-goes-pink-for-breast-cancer-awareness-2199522.php#next
I remember them doing it last year also but not sure when they started to do it. I know it threw me off last weekend when I put on a game and was reminded of this LOL.
